solution_line_template: Between Monday and Wednesday, she spends {hours_monday} hours + {hours_wednesday} hours = <<{hours_monday}+{hours_wednesday}={hours_mon_wed}>>{hours_mon_wed} hours.
That means she has {total_weekly_hours} hours - {hours_mon_wed} hours = <<{total_weekly_hours}-{hours_mon_wed}={hours_tue_fri}>>{hours_tue_fri} hours left for Tuesday and Wednesday
She spends {hours_tue_fri} hours / {num_tue_fri_days}=<<{hours_tue_fri}/{num_tue_fri_days}={hours_friday}>>{hours_friday} hour on Friday
